Description: Glazed steatite cowroid with the back decorated with an ox-lung and a representation of a lotus bud between striated borders, longitudinally pierced, the base decorated with a representation of a cow with a sun-disc between the horns (Hathor) standing in a papyrus boat in a papyrus thicket.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.54
